title: The Hunted
overview: A cop investigating a jewel robbery finds that all trails lead to his girlfriend - but she claims she's being framed.
tagline: The TENSION ... of relentless pursuit ! The TERROR of unknown danger !

title: A Gunman Has Escaped
overview: In this crime drama, three gem thieves must get out of London after they kill a man. Friction between the men increases as they hide out on a farm and then get back on the road. Trouble ensues when one of the three begins suspecting the others of treachery.

title: The Inner Circle
overview: A fresh-faced young detective gets set up, framed for murder, and alibied by a smart blonde.

title: Mr. Gregoire Runs Away
overview: Alex Grégoire is a timid insurance company clerk who shares his uneventful life between his wife Angèle, his colleagues and his passion for crosswords. But all of a sudden his existence changes dramatically. First because he wins a crossword competition. Second because a jewel thief, Charles Tuffal, thinks he recognizes in him a former accomplice. From that moment "uneventful" is not the best adjective to qualify Alex's life anymore...

title: Man on the Run
overview: An Army deserter, still a fugitive in Post-War Britain, wanders into a pawn-shop robbery and finds himself wanted for murder. He meets a war widow who helps him elude the police while he looks for the real criminals.

title: Confidencias de un ruletero
overview: Taxi driver takes the wrong passenger at the wrong time and gets caught up in a murder investigation.

title: Why Girls Leave Home
overview: In this crime drama, a young woman leaves her unhappy life at home to become a sophisticated night club singer. Her first job is nearly fatal when she entangles herself with the mobsters who own the joint and learns too much about their operation. Her boss decides to kill her and make it look like suicide. An intrepid reporter disbelieves the report and exposes the truth to the public.
tagline: The VIOLENT, UNVARNISHED TRUTH about the scores of thousands of young girls who recklessly toss away home ties for a life of dangerous thrills!

title: Duel
overview: The Second World War. A new L-2 heavy duty gun is being supplied to the Soviet Army. German intelligence needs to seize a new secret weapon.

title: Two Smart People
overview: Con woman Ricki Woodner and detective Bob Simms follow a prison-bound swindler Ace Connors  on his five-day gourmet binge.
tagline: Gun-play and heart-beats in a thrill-a-second love story !

title: Pillow of Death
overview: Attorney Wayne Fletcher and his secretary have an affair. When Wayne's wife is found smothered to death, he becomes the prime suspect. As the police investigate the murder, a psychic with questionable motives tries to contact the deceased woman. Soon, Wayne begins seeing visions of his dead wife, and other people involved with the case begin to be killed, one by one.
tagline: HATE! Crawling back from the grave!

title: Son of Zorro
overview: A man returning home after having fought in the Civil War discovers that corrupt politicians have taken over the county and are terrorizing and shaking down the citizens. He dons the costume of his ancestor, the famous Zorro, and sets out to bring them to justice.
tagline: THE BOLDEST MAN IN THE WEST LIVES AGAIN...striking blow after blow against ruthless...reckless renegades!

title: Johnny Stool Pigeon
overview: A federal agent infiltrates a crime syndicate.
tagline: They cracked the back of the world's blackest racket ! A cop ! A dame ! A killer !

title: The Lost Tribe
overview: Jungle Jim fights a lion and sharks trying to save an African village from those who would despoil it.

title: The Brighton Strangler
overview: After suffering a head injury during the Blitz, John Loder, a theatre actor comes to believe himself to be the Brighton Strangler, the murderer he was playing onstage.

title: Hideout
overview: Philip Ford's crime thriller stars Lloyd Bridges as a city attorney who comes to the dawning realization that a jewelry heist may be behind the discovery of a dead body in the park -- and that the culprit may be one of the town's leading citizens (Ray Collins). Unfortunately, his investigation is hampered by his girlfriend and ex-secretary (Lorna Gray), who could very well be in cahoots with the bad guys.
tagline: A WOMAN DEFIES GANG LORDS IN THEIR...HIDEOUT

title: Madonna of the Desert
overview: A jeweled Madonna, property of rancher Joe Salinas, attracts two crooks to his ranch, Monica Dell, a smooth operator, and ruthless Nick Julian. Joe believe that the statue has a miraculous power to ward off evil, and Monica, after a narrow escape from injury while trying to steal the statue, is converted to Joe's faith and refuses to go through with the robbery. Nick has no such intentions.

title: The Gentleman from Nowhere
overview: Security guard, wounded in a robbery of furs, arouses the suspicions of an insurance investigator.
tagline: SEEKING VENGEANCE...WOULD HE FIND LOVE...or MURDER?

title: The Adventures of P.C. 49: Investigating the Case of the Guardian Angel
overview: A police constable goes undercover to infiltrate a gang of violent thieves.

title: Deadline for Murder
overview: A favor for an old friend leads a Los Angeles gambler (Kent Taylor) into a dangerous search for a missing document.

title: Law of the Barbary Coast
overview: Wayne Adams is murdered in a Barbary Coast saloon and gambling hall in San Francisco in 1880, and his sister, Julie, enlists the aid of the district attorney, Michael Lodge, in gathering evidence in which to convict the owner of the gambling house of the crime. In order to do so, Julie poses as a dance-hall-girl, and soon finds herself in a dangerous situation.

title: Slippy McGee
overview: A safecracker breaks his leg and reforms with a good girl and a priest.

title: Larceny in Her Heart
overview: In the second of the PRC "Michael Shayne" series,civic crusader Burton Stallings hires private detective Michael Shayne to locate the former's missing step-daughter Helen. Shayne discovers that Stallings himself has had Helen confined in an asylum in order to obtain her money.
tagline: Mike Goes On Vacation... And What a Workout... What Fun!... For Everyone but....

title: Sky Dragon
overview: All the passengers on an airplane headed for San Francisco are drugged, and when they wake up, it is discovered that a quarter-million dollars is missing. Charlie Chan--and, of course, his #1 son--must discover the identity of the person who doped the passengers and stole the money.
tagline: Death rides the clouds

title: Parole, Inc.
overview: A federal agent's life is in danger when he's exposed while investigating a parole scheme.
tagline: The True Story of the Nation's Parole-Peddling Syndicate

title: The Revenge of Roger
overview: Roger Laroque is now a rich man. He returns to France under the name of William Farnell. There, he discovers that on the one hand his wife has died of a broken heart and on the other that his daughter Suzanne is in love with Raymond de Noirville, the son of his former mistress. With the help of a few friends, Roger coldly prepares his revenge.

title: The Devil's Mask
overview: A San Francisco airplane bound for South America crashes, and among the scorched debris is found a shrunken native human head, neatly packaged. The perplexed police contact a local anthropology museum about this unclaimed piece of grisly baggage, where they intersect with Jack and Doc, two private eyes, called there to meet a mysterious woman who had a case for them and wanted to meet in private.
tagline: TRAPPED IN A MAN-MADE JUNGLE!

title: Boston Blackie's Rendezvous
overview: Blackie helps the police rescue hostage from an escaped maniac on a killing spree.
tagline: Strangler on the Loose! Copper on the Trail! SHOCKER on the Screen!

title: Live Wires
overview: Slip gets fired from his job at a construction company for decking his boss. His sister, who got him a job at the company, is angry with him. Slip manages to get a job with the District Attorney serving warrants, as does Sach. Through his job, Slip finds out that all is not quite kosher at his old construction company, and that his sister may be in danger.
tagline: They'll Short-Circuit Your Funnybone!

title: Adventures of Frank and Jesse James
overview: Jesse James returns to Missouri, and he and brother Frank come to the aid of a young woman who owns a gold mine. Her father was murdered and she took over the mine, and now the villains who killed her father are trying to drive her out of the mine so they can take it over.
tagline: THE FABULOUS JAMES BOYS...Wanted By The Law...Hunted By Outlaws!

title: Johnny Holiday
overview: A guard (William Bendix) befriends a wayward youth (Allen Martin Jr.) sent to the Indiana Boys School.
tagline: The Story of the Teen-Age Terror!

title: For You I Die
overview: A convict is forced to participate in a prison break even though he only has a year left on his sentence.

title: The Spider and the Fly
overview: "The Spider and the Fly is set in Paris during the cloud-cuckoo days before WW I. The storyline intertwines the destinies of three people. Guy Rolfe plays Phillipe de Ledocq, a resourceful safecracker who always manages to elude arrest. Eric Portman is cast as police-chief Maubert, who will not rest until Ledocq is behind bars. And Nadia Gray is Madeleine, the woman beloved by both Ledocq and Maubert. Just as Maubert has managed to capture his man, Ledocq is released at the behest of the government, who wants him to steal secrets from the German embassy revealing the whereabouts of the Kaiser's secret agents. And just how does Madeleine figure into all of this? Spider and the Fly is a diverting precursor to the 1960s TV series It Takes a Thief." ~ Hal Erickson, Rovi
tagline: A New British Thriller of Crime, Detection and Suspense!

title: Open Secret
overview: A couple discovers that their friend has gone missing. Their investigation leads them to believe that anti-semites are behind the disappearance.
tagline: The Pull-No-Punch drama of men chained together by hate!

title: A Dangerous Profession
overview: A cop-turned-bail bondsman gets involved in a murder investigation.
tagline: Thieves and Killers are my Clients!

title: Charlie Chan in The Jade Mask
overview: The latest assignment for respected detective Charlie Chan has come directly from the government and involves the disappearance of a scientist named Harper, who was working on an extremely important serum. When the scientist is killed, Chan must sort through all very likely suspects, including the man's sister and his butler.
tagline: A MYSTERY MANSION...Where death lurks in every dark corner and a mad genius runs loose!

title: The Last Crooked Mile
overview: A mystery grows after a bank robbery car leads investigators to a carnival sideshow.
tagline: High pressure drama of HOT MONEY in a GETAWAY CAR!

title: Undercover Maisie
overview: Maisie Revere, a showgirl stranded in Los Angeles, decides to join the local police department on the persuasion of Lieutenant Paul Scott who wants to use her as an undercover agent to expose a conman.
tagline: How would you like to be PINCHED by Maisie? (she's the cutest cop on the force!)

title: Independence Night
overview: Park, Ohn - Ran (Kim Shin - jae) has been watching the surroundings of the pawn shop owner Min - ga, who is the enemy who killed his father with Song (Choi Dong - san) for five years. The private house tries to rape her daughter who does not recognize her daughter Sunhee to leave the ring. Young-gil (Choi In-gyu) goes in front of the pawn shop and saves Sun-hee and the two hide in a nearby warehouse. Sunhee left after the mother who was driven by the private house and came back from liberation. Song binds Sunhee and Kyungil, but Olan releases her, saying that the house is the enemy and not the daughter. And after hearing the conversation between the two, he finds that he is his younger brother.

title: Danger Street
overview: Magazine owners sell a revealing photo, then play detective when the deal leads to murder.
tagline: SCANDAL AND MURDER!

title: The Lucky Stiff
overview: A lawyer spooks gangsters by faking a framed singer's electrocution.

title: The Flame
overview: George McAllister, the black sheep of a wealthy family who has squandered his share of the family inheritance, lives in constant jealousy, hatred and resentment of his half-brother Barry, who has been supporting him. George gets his girlfriend, Carlotta Duval, a job as Barry's nurse, with the idea being to marry him, kill him, and inherit his money—and marrying George.
tagline: "I'D BE A FOOL TO LET LOVE STAND IN MY WAY!"

title: The Dawn
overview: An instructive film on the topic of the eradication of smuggling and democratic police.

title: The Invisible Informer
overview: An aristocratic but destitute southern family attempts to swindle an insurance company by faking the theft of a valuable emerald necklace. The company assigns operatives Eve Rogers and Mike Regan to the case.
tagline: HE WAS AN EXPERT ON THE TRIPLE CROSS!

title: Main Street After Dark
overview: A police detective (Edward Arnold) uses fluorescent powder to catch a pickpocket (Selena Royle) and her gang.
tagline: The true story of today's girl gangsters

title: Fall Guy
overview: A drugged man covered in blood is picked up by police. Before the cops can get answers the man escapes in search of answers to the mystery himself.
tagline: HUNTED FOR A LOVE SLAYING!

title: St. Val's Mystery
overview: Désiré Le Sec has just won the "amateur policeman contest" and he is so glad he 's telling all the people around.He is an insure agent ,and his boss,his uncle,is annoyed :a man took out a big life insurance and died soon afterward.

title: Between Eleven and Midnight
overview: Between eleven o’clock and midnight one evening, a notorious trafficker Jérôme Vidauban is shot whilst walking in a tunnel in Paris. The case is assigned to Inspector Carrel, who is Vidauban’s perfect double. Using his resemblance to the arch criminal, Carrel manages to infiltrate in Vidauban’s circle of acquaintances and contacts. He becomes embroiled in a bizarre web of intrigue and discovers no shortage of possible murder suspects, all of whom appear to be surprised to see him still alive.

title: The Bellman
overview: The bell ringer at a way station in the French Alps, murders a passing horse trader with a thrown rock and relieves him of his bankroll, in order to bribe the daughter of his only friend, a head injury victim considered the village simpleton, into marrying him, despite her love for a lowly woodsman who is, in turn, being cajoled into marriage by the daughter of the wealthy innkeeper.

title: The Falcon's Adventure
overview: A society sleuth rescues a kidnapped woman, then is framed for murder.
tagline: Death-Ring Stalks Diamond Queen In Miami-Manhattan Murder Axis!

title: Train to Alcatraz
overview: Criminals aboard a train to the infamous penitentiary plot an escape, and receive outside help in their attempt.

title: Alias the Champ
overview: Slammin’ Sammy Menacker is killed in the ring, and Gorgeous George (in his only film appearance) is arrested for murder. Out to clear his name is his manager Lorraine and cop Ron Peterson, who was already on the scene to investigate the Mob’s influence on pro wrestling.
tagline: Wait'll You See Gorgeous George

title: G-Men Never Forget
overview: An escaped criminal impersonates a Police Commissioner, causing no end of trouble to a determined Federal Agent.

title: The Avalanche
overview: An ambitious and selfish lawyer confesses to the murder of his first wife. Some of the scenes were filmed in the last weeks of the war.

title: Impasse of Two Angels
overview: Stage actress Marianne has decided to give up her career to marry wealthy nobleman Marquis Antoine de Fontaines. As a wedding present, Antoine gives his future wife a precious diamond necklace, which is coveted by a gang of crooks. Jean, one of them, is given the mission to approach Marianne and steal the necklace from her. The only trouble is that when he meets her, she recognizes him as the man she once loved.

title: Criminal Court
overview: A lawyer who is planning to run for District Attorney accidentally kills a gangster who owns the nightclub where the attorney's girlfriend is a singer. Although he manages to cover up his involvement in the crime, his girlfriend discovers the body and is subsequently charged with the murder.

title: Jewels of Brandenburg
overview: A former secret agent is sent to retrieve a priceless collection of stolen jewels from a Lisbon nightclub owner who worked both sides during World War II.

title: Danger Woman
overview: A woman plots to steal secrets from her Atomic-expert husband.

title: Passkey to Danger
overview: An advertising man's new campaign for a fashion designer attracts the attention of mysterious characters.

title: I, Jane Doe
overview: While stationed in France during World War II, an American fighter pilot marries a French girl but leaves her behind when he returns to the U.S. The French woman follows him to America only to discover he’s already married to a successful lawyer.
tagline: A powerful love story...humanly told!

title: Accomplice
overview: A private detective and his assistant are hired to find a missing husband. The seemingly easy case is complicated by a dead body.
tagline: Racing Against Time... Chasing The Woman He Hated!

title: The Missing Lady
overview: While investigating the theft of a valuable jade statue known as "The Missing Lady" -- and the subsequent murder of an art dealer -- imperceptible sleuth Lamont Cranston aka the Shadow (Kane Richmond) finds himself being blamed for the crime. It doesn't help the Shadow's claims of innocence when more bodies begin piling up. Good thing he knows exactly who's guilty among an increasingly smaller group of suspects.
tagline: A Mystery Thrill-Treat from the Annals of The Shadow

title: Night Round
overview: During Christmas night, two police officers make their nocturnal rounds, in their round they meet tramps, brawlers in a café, a naked man, a concierge, a sexton, revelers in a nightclub, and end by signing in their report to the police station.

title: Philo Vance's Secret Mission
overview: Philo Vance is hired to write a true-crime mystery... but when the facts about an unsolved crime are about to be brought out into the open a murder takes place.
tagline: Secret murder... Sinister mission

title: Majestic Hotel Cellars
overview: In my “cellar” where case workers all the people of a great hotel, the head of the café, Donge, finds the corpse of Mrs Petersen, a rich client. The investigation by Maigret allows him to rub the husband of the victim, a Swede, Teddy, Ms Petersen’s son, his housekeeper, a social dancer and Donge himself who is the natural father of Teddy. The child he will go to his real father or not he will leave the rich Petersen who adores? The murder mystery and enigma sentimental are resolved by Maigret.

title: I Cheated the Law
overview: An attorney (Tom Conway) learns he was duped into being his gangster murder client's (Steve Brodie) alibi.
tagline: A triple cross that almost became a triple murder!

title: Hr. Petit
overview: The story about Mr. Petit - a French charming marriage trickster and murderer of women.
tagline: He lived a double life.

title: Shep Comes Home
overview: Little Larry Havens, whose father died in WWII, runs away from home to keep from being separated from "Shep," his father's dog. In Arizona, he is befriended by a kindly Mexican, Manuel Ortiz, who he is able to repay in time, with the aid of Sheriff "Cap" Weatherby, when Ortiz is suspected of crimes committed by local gangsters. "Shep" is instrumental in saving Ortiz from a lynching, and Larry, "Shep" and Ortiz all find a home with a couple they have befriended.
tagline: THRILLING ADVENTURE OF A BOY AND HIS DOG...in a heart-warming drama the whole family will enjoy!

title: Half Past Midnight
overview: A detective encounters a woman in a nightclub. He finds that she is being blackmailed by a dancer who is murdered that very night. Of course, the woman becomes the main suspect. She and the gumshoe team up and begin searching for the real killer.
tagline: You have a date...with DANGER, MURDER and ROMANCE!

title: Good-Time Girl
overview: Good Time Girl stars Jean Kent as incipient juvenile delinquent Gwen Rawlings. Sent to a home for "problem" girls, Gwen receives a crash course in petty crime. Back on the outside, she falls in with the usual bad crowd, and suffers spectacularly as a result.
tagline: And You Can Have Her!

title: High Tide
overview: A car accident traps two men inside a car near the water. With the tide coming in, they discuss the circumstances that led up to the accident.

title: Without Honor
overview: Jane, a housewife, is confronted during her daily chores by Dennis, her married lover with whom she has had a long affair. Dennis tells Jane that he has to break off their relationship. She threatens suicide, but when she picks up a shish kabob skewer, the two struggle and Dennis is stabbed in the chest and collapses. Jane hides the body in the house. Before she can leave, her brother-in-law arrives and tells her that he knows about the affair and that he has invited her husband, her lover, and his wife to her house that evening so that he can tell them about the affair.
tagline: Branded!

title: Shed No Tears
overview: A man listens to his wife and fakes his own death so that she can get her hands on his insurance policy.
tagline: Something always happened to her men...

title: Adventures of Kitty O'Day
overview: A telephone operator plays homicide detective with her boyfriend, making it harder for the police.
tagline: KITTY CHASES KILLERS...And Gets Her Man! The body was missing...but Kitty was willing!

title: Where the North Begins
overview: A Canadian Mountie investigates the disappearance of a brother officer.
tagline: PACKED WITH THE ADVENTURE OF THE NORTHERN WILDERNESS!

title: The Case of the Baby-Sitter
overview: The baby sitter is none other than veteran Hollywood tough guy Tom Neal. A private detective, Neal is hired to keep an eye on the child of married couple George Meeker and Rebel Randall. Actually, Meeker and Randall are jewel thieves, and their "baby" is their stolen loot. Neal eventually catches on when he realizes that this is the quietest child on earth. Running a scant 41 minutes, Case of the Baby Sitter was designed to be shown in tandem with another Screen Guild Productions "briefie," The Hat Box Mystery: the films were shot back to back, with Tom Neal and Pamela Blake starring in both.
tagline: Stolen Gems! Silken Gams!... Together They Mean Trouble!

title: I Didn't Do It
overview: Gormless George Trotter (George Formby) moves down from Manchester to the bright lights of London in search of fame and fortune on the stage - only to find himself the prime suspect in a bizarre murder mystery!  Whilst staying at Ma Tubbs' theatrical boarding house, a man is murdered in the room right next door to George. When George tries to solve the mystery, he ends up presenting the police with a whole load of clues - all of which point to him as the culprit!  Now George must uncover the real murderer himself, with the help of his showbiz friends, his little Ukulele and a fiendishly cunning song!  This delightful comedy musical includes three full-length musical numbers - The Daring Young Man, She's Got Two of Everything and I'd Like a Dream Like That.

title: Big Town
overview: A newspaper editor goes on an anti-crime crusade, but gets carried away.
tagline: Now see the radio show that thrilled millions!

title: Dual Alibi
overview: A French PR man and his girlfriend steal a lottery ticket from twin trapeze artists, prompting murder.
tagline: The perfect murder?

title: Inside Job
overview: A pair of married ex-convicts trying to go straight get jobs at a department store. A gangster who knows about their past threatens to expose it unless they agree to help him rob the department store.

title: Behind City Lights
overview: This Republic programmer stars Lynne Roberts as a country gal who is slickered by a couple of city-fied jewel thieves, played by Peter Cookson and Jerome Cowan. Roberts is set up for a patsy by these two rogues, and nearly ends up in jail-and later on, narrowly escapes being rubbed out by gangsters.
tagline: DO WOMEN KNOW THEIR OWN HEARTS? The one didn't until almost too late!

title: Capek's Tales
overview: Five crime stories connected by the narration of police superintendent Bartosek.

title: Campus Sleuth
overview: A photographer is choked to death just outside of where a college dance is being held. The body is discovered by Lee Watson, but promptly disappears, as it is being whisked from one point to another on the campus by a night watchman, who is an ex-convict.
tagline: It's a Rumpus on the Campus!

title: 56, rue Pigalle
overview: Lucien Bonnet, Jean Vigneron's manservant, blackmails his boss, who is having an affair with Inès de Montalban, married to Ricardo. Vigneron pays the sum but Lucien is killed by an accomplice, Baruch. Everything seems to accuse Jean who, for fear of compromising Inès, prefers to keep mum. Fortunately, his innocence will be proved thanks to a surprise witness. The two lovers flee to Congo while the husband soon forgets them, finding comfort in debauchery.

title: Allotment Wives
overview: Unscrupulous women marry servicemen for their pay.
tagline: They're Pretty To Look At . . . But POISON To Love!

title: Gentleman Joe Palooka
overview: In the second film of Monogram's Joe Palooka series, Joe is 'used', by two state senators scheming to obtain oil-rich lands, in a publicity campaign to get the land transferred to the state, supposedly for a park. When Joe learns that he has been used as a dupe he becomes disillusioned and leaves the prize=fighting profession. But, his manager, sparring partners, and fiancée manage to expose the land-grab scheme, clear Joe's name and discredit the crooked politicians.

title: Arson, Inc.
overview: An arson investigator goes undercover to break up a ring that sets fires in order to collect the insurance.
tagline: Sensational expose of the firebug racket!

title: Killers All
overview: Exploitative roadshow documentary focusing on gangsters of the 1930's: Bonnie Parker (and Clyde Barrow), John Dillinger, Machine Gun Kelly, and Pretty Boy Floyd.
tagline: FOR THE FIRST TIME IT BLASTS THE SCREEN WITH THE UNCENSORED BRUTAL TRUTH!

title: Send for Paul Temple
overview: Novelist and amateur sleuth, Paul Temple, meets a newspaper woman called "Steve." Together they investigate a gang of diamond robbers.

title: Crime Doctor's Man Hunt
overview: A criminal psychologist investigates the murder of a veteran with amnesia.
tagline: HUNTING A Killer THRU THE JUNGLES OF A WOMAN'S MIND!

title: Daybreak
overview: A mysterious barber hides a secret identity that eventually leads to tragedy.

title: Killer Dill
overview: Door-to-door salesman Johnny Dill, the exact double of a notorious gangster, finds himself struck between the forces of good and evil.
tagline: How Funny Can A Picture Get??? You'll Know When You See Killer Dill!

title: Ghost Tower
overview: Horror film directed by Kôzô Saeki.

title: The Crime Doctor's Diary
overview: A criminal psychologist tries to clear his patient of arson charges.

title: Bodyhold
overview: A plumber with a girlfriend turns pro wrestler for a crooked promoter.
tagline: HEART-SLAMMING DRAMA - BODY-SLAMMING ACTION...inside the Wrestling Racket!

title: Calling Paul Temple
overview: Paul Temple is called in to help Scotland Yard track down a serial killer who has murdered several wealthy women.

title: A Gun in His Hand
overview: In this MGM Crime Does Not Pay series short, a young man graduates from the police academy at the top of his class. He then teams up with some local thieves and uses his knowledge of police procedures to pursue a career of undetected crime.

title: Portrait of a Murderer
overview: A circus daredevil is the next victim of a danger-seducing woman who tricks him into a potentially deadly stunt after he attempted to kill her.

title: Canon City
overview: Prisoners battle each other -- and the police -- when they escape the Colorado State Penitentiary.
tagline: Filmed with the NAKED FURY of fact!

title: Secret Service Investigator
overview: Lloyd Bridges plays a flying ace war hero who gets sucked into a counterfeiting scheme by opposing gangs of crooks.
tagline: SHOCKING SUSPENSE...in the Smash Story of the Screen!
